name: Range Anxiety
description:
Range Anxiety

CAN YOU SURVIVE GOLF!? Run across the 3D driving range, but take care not to be hit by any balls! Otherwise you might become "handicap"-ped.


Controls

3D movement as in Minecraft:

WASD: Move
Mouse: Look around
Ctrl or Shift: Run

Menu navigation:

1234: Starts level 1 through 4
R: Restart level
T: Title screen
F: Full screen (breaks mouse movement a bit)
Esc: Exit game

Ball Types

These are explained in-game as well (top-left corner)

White -- Normal balls.
Red -- Superfast balls. Make a larger sound when golfed.
Cyan -- Curveballs. Might accelerate towards you.

Download

This JAR file requires Java 8 to run (7 and 11 DO NOT work!)
